name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Frontend Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance web applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue**, and **AngularJS**, with a deep understanding of **REST APIs** and **JSON**. Experienced in optimizing frontend development using tools like **Webpack**, **Jest**, and performance best practices to enhance user experience.
Skilled in version control with **Git** and proficient in native JavaScript concepts and libraries, ensuring code quality and performance. Committed to implementing secure code practices while maintaining compliance with industry standards. Strong analytical, mathematical, and problem-solving skills complement my capability to work both independently and collaboratively in team settings.
